creator: calmman@hotmail.com
text:
I have the following configuration:

RewriteEngine On
RewriteRule ^(.*)Link\?(.*) /link.php?dir=$1&$2

I expect a request /bd/Link?a=b to be translated to /link.php?dir=/bd/&a=b 
but rewrite rule newer gets executed.

You mean, that the rule never matches.

sure, it matches the path only. A rewritelog had shown it to you.
creator: nd@perlig.de
slive@apache.org
text:
Just a hint:  You can use a RewriteCond to match against the %{QUERY_STRING}.

This could be better document.
